name: Jaku Miya
description: I do a lot of volunteer handyperson work around the community and I don't always know the details of the situation until I get to the location of the project.

name: Manu Khan
description: Bought a couple of these but always have same issue.It's to easy to lose the bits.That are fairly small and are spring ball attached.They just go missing to easy, and it's the bit you most often use.Gonna try the wera kompackt with the rapidator fixing.

name: L Mariya
description: I've had several of these, and all of them I have somehow managed to strip the nut driver part out. I was loosening some small headed bolts on an electric motor, and stripped it out.
